definitions.definition: A specialist in marketing (promoting and selling products and services).
One who promotes and sells products or services; called a marketer in US English.
Someone who works in or supports a certain kind of system of selling and buying, for example free marketeer , black marketeer .

main_definition: ( US ) A specialist in marketing (promoting and selling products and services).
secondary_definitions: ( UK ) One who promotes and sells products or services; called a marketer in US English.
Someone who works in or supports a certain kind of system of selling and buying, for example free marketeer , black marketeer .
